text: @DonaldJTrumpJr COVID-19 may be  karma for fck faces like you!!! May not take you but could damn well take someone you love if you actually feel love for anyone. Cheating lying scumbag just like @realDonaldTrump not a honest, moral bone in those disgusting bodies you walk around in.
